title: Drawing, "W. & J. Sloane: Modern Upholstery Chair Designs", 1935
medium: Graphite, red and green color pencil, pen and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: W. AND J. SLOANE MODERN UPHOLSTERY LINE FALL 1935.; at left margin: 1/2/3/4/5[each circled] Inscribed in graphite with design numbers throughout
description: 10 chairs Deskey numbers reading from upper left horizontally: 9200 S., 9200 C4, 9201, 9202 S., 9202 C4., 9203, 9204 S., 9204 C4., 9205, 9206 S., 9206 C4., 9207, 9208 S., 9208 C4., 9209

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "W. & J. Sloane: Modern Upholstery Chair Designs", 1935.
1935. Graphite, red and green color pencil, pen and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-182.
